hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah reported the Apostle of Allaah(ﷺ) as saying “When you travel in fertile country, give the Camel their due (from the ground), and when you travel in time of drought make them go quickly. When you intend to encamp in the last hours of the night, keep away from the roads.”

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي سُرْعَةِ السَّيْرِ وَالنَّهْىِ عَنِ التَّعْرِيسِ، فِي الطَّرِيقِ
chapter.eng-name: Regarding Traveling Fast, And Prohibition Of Staying On Roads At Night
